description: This file implements the methods of the RialtoConnector class, which manages application sessions, handles state transitions, and interacts with a server manager service within a plugin-based framework. It includes functions for initializing, creating, suspending, resuming, deactivating sessions, and handling state change notifications.

classes.name: RialtoConnector
classes.description: Main class managing Rialto application sessions and state transitions.

methods.name: void initialize()
methods.description: Initializes the Rialto connector, sets up configuration and server manager service.

methods.name: bool createAppSession(const std::string & callsign,const std::string & displayName,const std::string & appId)
methods.description: Creates a new application session with specified callsign, display name, and app ID.

methods.name: bool resumeSession(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Resumes a suspended application session identified by callsign.

methods.name: bool suspendSession(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Suspends an active application session identified by callsign.

methods.name: const RialtoServerStates getCurrentAppState(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of the application session identified by callsign.

methods.name: bool deactivateSession(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Deactivates an active or inactive session identified by callsign.

methods.name: void stateChanged(const std::string & appId,const RialtoServerStates & state)
methods.description: Handles a notification indicating that the state of an application has changed.

methods.name: bool waitForStateChange(const std::string & appId,const RialtoServerStates & state,int timeoutMillis)
methods.description: Waits for an application’s state to reach a specified value within a timeout period.

ctags.name: createAppSession
ctags.signature: (const std::string & callsign,const std::string & displayName,const std::string & appId)

ctags.name: waitForStateChange
ctags.pattern: /^    bool RialtoConnector::waitForStateChange(const std::string& appId, const RialtoServerStates&/
